listing.listing_description: Let the warm sea and five-star service wash—and pamper—your cares away at Villa Neung. Part of the exclusive gated Mandalay Beach Villas on the gorgeous coast of Koh Samui, this three-bedroom vacation rental offers true luxury in its melding of a beautiful beachfront setting, attentive staff and thoughtful modern design.Your stay at Villa Neung begins with a complimentary airport transfer, and includes continental breakfast and the services of a chef, housekeeper and property manager. Spend your holiday enjoying the sea breeze from a lounge chair by the infinity pool, or step down to the beach to sunbathe or paddle along the shore in one of the villa’s kayaks. In the evenings, try out local seafood on the barbecue and make the most of the balmy weather with dinner at the al-fresco table.The villa’s layout separates the property into two halves: one with the open-air great room, the other with the more private bedrooms. In the great room, you can opt to let the warm air waft in over the relaxed yet refined wicker sectional and chic Louis Ghost-style dining chairs, or let the blinds down for shade. At the far end of the room, the fully equipped kitchen features an inviting breakfast bar and sleek, state-of-the-art appliances.Each of the three bedrooms at Villa Neung has a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and opens to the terrace. Details like built-in cupboards and shelves, low-slung beds with crisp white bedding and wicker accent chairs give the bedrooms serene, comfortable appeal.Whether you’ve come to Koh Samui for a family beach vacation or a tropical honeymoon, you’ll find something near Villa Neung to please. The property is located right on the sands of Ban Laem Noi, and there are five other beaches to explore within an 18 km drive, from Nathon with its pier and night market to trendy Bophut. Play a round of golf at Santiburi Samui Country Club, visit the charming oceanfront Fisherman’s Village Plaza, stand in awe at Big Buddha Temple or meet local fauna at Na Muang Safari Park. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 23 km drive from the villa to Samui Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Baan Dalah is a stunning beachfront luxury villa on the island of Koh Samui. Situated near Bophut on the northeast coast, the villa's estate borders a sublime stretch of Big Buddha Beach and enjoys panoramic ocean views of the Gulf of Thailand and the island of Koh Phan Ngan. Beautiful outdoor living areas, exquisite interior spaces, and three sumptuous bedrooms create a unique private world for an unforgettable vacation with family and friends.The private estate includes three pavilions surrounding a beautiful Buddhist garden, along with a gorgeous terrace with nineteen-meter infinite swimming pool bordering the beach's pristine white sand. Savor enchanting hours on elegant loungers in the South Pacific sun, and float in the scintillating pool while gazing out on breathtaking, unobstructed vistas. Plunge into the azure sea and return for a delicious alfresco lunch on the terrace. Linger outdoors through the evening, sipping sunset cocktails and relishing the nocturnal breeze.Lovely glass doors join the terrace and the main pavilion, inviting an exquisite open-air feel indoors. Relax with a bottle of wine and your favorite TV shows in the beautiful lounge. Cook fabulous Thai meals in the fully equipped kitchen, and feast together at the superb dining table. The main living room features high, peaked ceilings of rich wood, evoking classic Thai tradition, while the elegant furnishings provide modern comfort in harmony with the precious natural surroundings. Your vacation rental additionally includes excellent staff and provisions, including daily breakfast.The master bedroom is in its own pavilion. Spacious and exquisitely furnished, it features a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom. The two guestrooms occupy the third pavilion; one has a king bed and one has two twins, and they both have ensuite bathrooms. All of the villa's bedrooms include safes, ceiling fans, and doors to the main terrace.In addition to your direct access to Big Buddha Beach, you're just minutes by car from some of the island's finest and most renowned beaches, including Bophut and Chaweng. Fisherman's Village is only three kilometers away, and Wat Plai Laem about three. The airport is only four kilometers away, and complimentary two-way transfer is provided. Baan Dalah is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This spectacular luxury villa on the southwestern shore of Phuket Island is just minutes from Kamala Beach. Its exquisite indoor and outdoor living areas are perfectly situated for enjoying the panoramic ocean views and breezes ("Samira" means "cool breeze"). For families, destination wedding guests, and adventurous friends seeking a unique and breathtaking setting for their Thailand adventure, this six-bedroom vacation rental will be unforgettable.The villa's extraordinary design—a contemporary variation on classic Thai themes—includes a spectacular pool terrace and equally impressive alfresco Great Room overlooking the Andaman Sea and the Bay of Bengal. Enjoy fresh mornings bathing in the hot tub and floating in the nineteen-meter infinite swimming pool. Relax on poolside loungers, withdraw beneath the parasol for cocktails, and relish a barbeque lunch at the lovely alfresco table. In the evening, gather in the open Great Room, with sumptuous furnishings and soaring ceilings, to savor the beautiful sunset.Sliding glass walls invite delicious ocean breezes and dreamy views into the villa's gorgeous living and dining areas. Enjoy evening aperitifs in the elegant lounge. Prepare your favorite Thai dishes in the fully equipped kitchen, and congregate at the lovely dining table for ocean-view feasts. At night, retire to the media room to watch movies on the projector screen, or play a game of pool in the game room. Upon waking in the morning, refresh your body in the spa. Private chef, spa, and other services are available at extra cost.The villa's superb master bedroom suite features a king bed, an ample and furnished balcony with ocean views and a jetted plunge pool, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The five guest bedrooms all feature king beds, too, along with balconies, ocean views, and ensuite bathrooms (two with ocean-view tubs). The king bed in bedroom six can be converted into two twins.Villa Samira enjoys an ideal balance of serene seclusion and convenient proximity to the island's cultural and natural riches. Kamala Beach is just six kilometers away, while Patong Beach and Surin Beach can be reached in minutes. Golf lovers are an easy drive to Red Mountain Golf Course and Laguna Golf Course. The bustling town of Patong is a fifteen-minute drive from your garage.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This enchanting villa is situated within a private, gated community along the west coast of the island of Phuket, within walking distance of Surin Beach. It was designed by Ernesto Bedmar and features beautiful natural materials that harmonize with the lush coastline and timeless sea, while high-end appliances and amenities provide an exquisite luxury experience. Professional staff and services include a private chef, housekeeping, and a villa manager.The villa offers ample opportunity to savor its extraordinary vistas of Surin Bay while savoring the South Pacific sun and breeze. The tiered deck features two pools: a kid-friendly pool with jets and a main pool with infinite edge that fuses with the turquoise expanse. A sala pavilion features sumptuous daybeds, while a shaded table invites you to alfresco meals in the enchanting breeze. At sunset, gather for cocktails on the rooftop terrace and behold the sunset over the Andaman Sea.Sliding glass doors open to the main pavilion, infusing the living areas with ocean light and alfresco ambiance. Sectional sofas in the lounge are ideal for nighttime gatherings, while the dining table seats eight for home-cooked feasts. The villa includes a separate entertainment room as well as a private fitness room, and its Western and Asian-style kitchens are fully equipped with chef-grade appliances.The villa features a master suite with a king bed, two guest suites with one double bed each, and a kid-friendly suite with a double bed and bunk bed. Each suite is well appointed with an ensuite bathroom, desk, lounge, safe, and ceiling fan, and all enjoy balconies and ocean views. The vaulted master suite is on the upper level and enjoys particularly sublime vistas from its furnished balcony, while its bathroom includes a soaking tub beside a picture window.The villa offers a fine balance of exquisite privacy and convenient proximity to the cultural, natural, and sporting riches of Phuket. You can walk to Surin Beach or drive a few minutes of Kamala Beach, while golf-lovers can take their pick of Phuket Golf Center, Laguna Golf Resort, and Loch Palm. Families will love the FantaSea theme park, less than three kilometers away. Proximity to Phuket International Airport makes this villa an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stay in magazine-worthy interiors in a postcard-worthy setting at YO Villa. Set in the exclusive Plai Laem area, this Koh Samui vacation rental commands views of neighboring islands and the cerulean sea. Its beautifully appointed rooms and four bedrooms are complemented by a full staff, offering luxury accommodations for up to eight.Your holiday at YO includes the services of a chef, villa manager and housekeeper. After arriving by complimentary airport transfer and sipping a cold welcome drink, you’ll be free to relax on a terrace with an infinity pool, plenty of loungers, a barbecue and an al-fresco dining area. Other amenities range from a home theater and private gym to a wine fridge and Wi-Fi.Fold-away glass walls lead from the terrace to a U-shaped great room with sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Sleek furnishings set a contemporary tone, from chrome-legged chairs and a clean-lined sectional to more playful pieces like a sheep sculpture. For your comfort, the villa is fully air conditioned.YO Villa’s four bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to eight friends or family members. Each one is as well appointed as a room at a resort, with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, TV and air conditioning. Streamlined furnishings in plush fabrics lend each suite a luxe feel, while plenty of stone gives spa-worthy appeal to the bathrooms.Thanks to the provided kayaks and beachfront location, you can be out on the water in minutes. The villa is also a 5-minute walk or less from stunning Samrong Bay Beach and Malati Beach, where you can swim, take a honeymoon-worthy stroll or stop for a drink at a laid-back bar close to the sand. With temples, an elephant sanctuary, and shopping and dining in Fisherman’s Village 10 minutes or less by car, it’s easy to get a feel for local culture.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Look out over azure seas and lush green hilltops from the perfectly named Villa Belle. Set on a hillside overlooking Choeng Mon, this Koh Samui vacation rental has gorgeous views—and equally appealing living spaces from which to enjoy them. Reserve its three bedrooms for a luxury getaway with family, a tropical escape with friends or even a dreamy honeymoon in the sun.Your holiday at Villa Belle begins with an airport transfer and includes a daily continental breakfast, shuttle service to and from the beach, and full-time Thai chef service. Spend lazy days watching the sun on the sea from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, loungers, al-fresco dining and a barbecue, or find your flow in the yoga area. After dark, flip on the Apple TV or satellite TV, sample the villa’s wine selection or catch up via Wi-Fi.Inside the villa, high ceilings and an open-concept layout are paired with traditional-inspired furnishings and artwork for a clean, contemporary look. Nearly wall-to-wall sliding glass doors link the living and dining areas to the terrace for uninterrupted sea views. Those same vistas are reflected in the mirrored breakfast bar in the well-equipped kitchen.Each of the three bedrooms at this luxury property has a king bed, private en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, sound system and an outdoor space, whether a deck or lounge area. As in the main living areas, the bedrooms are a stylish mix of the traditional and the modern.Though it’s set on a rise above the water, Villa Belle is just a half mile from the picture-perfect sands of Choeng Mon Beach, meaning that you’re just minutes away from a nap on its soft white sands, a massage or snack from a local vendor or a swim in the clear waters. It’s also a short drive from the nearest golf course and the lively outdoor market of Fisherman’s Village.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Your ultimate tropical hideaway.Located on the west coast of Thailand, a short distance from Phuket, is the resort island of Koh Yao Noi that hosts the newly completed 4-Bedroom Eagle’s Nest Luxury Villa overlooking the stunning Phang Nga Bay. The seascape of unique limestone islands is incomparable and considered by many to be one of the best views in Asia - in fact for that reason the nearby islands were used as a setting in the 1974 James Bond film, The Man with the Golden Gun.Only 20 minutes from Phuket by speedboat but a million miles from the stresses of modern life, the island paradise of Koh Yao Noi may just be Thailand’s best kept secret. It is located within the magnificent Marine National Park of Phang Nga Bay which possesses over 40 islands and is home to indigenous sea gypsies and protected wildlife. This tropical island is accessible only by boat or helicopter and thus remains largely undeveloped, natural and peaceful. To arrive here is to step back in time.Completed in 2018, on an island with few private villas, the Eagle’s Nest luxury villa is unique for its quality and outlook. The sweeping panoramas from the property are simply breathtaking and can be seen from every room in this expansive estate nestled among the tree-tops. A skilled and personal staffing team ensures that every whim is catered for. The rental offering includes an open-air seated van and driver. This is more than a home away from home, this is a serviced luxury villa on a remote and idyllic tropical island with every detail thought out.

listing.listing_description: Take a Koh Samui holiday that feels like a fantasy at the idyllic Sky Dream Villa. This private Chaweng paradise is perched above the Gulf of Thailand, boasting incredible panoramic views and an ideal location close to the beach, golf and more. Its cathedral-like interiors are a temple to relaxation and rejuvenation, and the English-speaking staff are there to make your stay a heavenly one.Your stay at this luxury vacation rental includes the services of a chef, property manager, housekeeper and security staff. Spend your days taking in the 180-degree views over the brilliant blue waters of Chaweng Noi Bay from the the outdoor living and dining areas. An infinity pool soaring 25 meters high is a dramatic focal point for entertaining friends and family. In the evenings, heat up the barbecue and mix up refreshments in the outdoor kitchen, or climb up to the sunset roof deck. Inside, the villa’s amenities range from an exercise room and home theater to a bar and games room with pool and ping-pong tables.Open-plan layouts, frameless floor-to-ceiling windows and vaulted ceilings bring the sea views inside, creating a bright, breezy ambience. The eclectic furnishings are stylish yet comfortable, from the metal-framed sofa and tufted chairs at the breakfast table to saturated area rugs and vintage-style light fixtures. The live-edge dining table and mod molded chairs are set in a bay of windows for maximum effect, and though chef service is included, the villa does have a fully equipped European kitchen.Relive your honeymoon in any of the four bedrooms at Sky Dream, all of which have king beds, en-suite bathrooms and lounge areas, and open directly to the terrace. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms blend antique-inspired pieces like brightly colored area rugs with clean-lined contemporary artwork.Though it feels like an escape from the everyday, Sky Dream Villa is only a 10-minute drive from some of the island’s most popular beaches. Lively Chaweng Beach is known for its scene as much as its sugary sands and turquoise water, while nearby Lamai Beach is quieter, but still has a great selection of oceanfront restaurants and bars. Ask staff about the best times to visit the local markets or about booking a tee time at the Royal Samui Golf and Country Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Creating an oasis of calm and privacy are gardens landscaped by the renowned designer Bill Bensley, creative touches enhance the individuality and bespoke customisation that defines this retreats.Kalya's two-storey layout of spacious pavilions, high vaulted ceilings and sliding glass doors connecting the indoor and outdoor spaces, is in complete harmony with the natural surroundings.Stylish, comfortable interiors are filled with hand-woven fabrics, traditionally carved furniture, and one-off specially commissioned pieces. Their expansive outside area comes complete with a private 20m infinity pool, swim-up bar, open-air dining, and relaxing day beds. All feature state-of-the-art amenities, modern kitchens, and a full team of dedicated staff to ensure the best in personal service.With your own private chef on hand day and night, you can enjoy custom-designed menus meticulously prepared with fresh local produce and the halthiest of ingredients. Fine wines compliment the authentic Royal Thai cuisine and Western gastronomy. Magnificent views from the outdoor dining space or the open plan glass-walled living space complete this unparalleled dining experience.

listing.listing_description: Enter Villa Yin and discover the treasures of one of Phuket’s true luxury rental gems. This palatial work of art – inspired by respected Thai architect Charupan Wiriyawiwatt – mixes elements of classic Thai architecture and a dazzling collection of contemporary art with a luxury design approach. Situated on Kamala headland’s water edge, this spectacular half-acre site overlooks the turquoise waters of the Andaman Sea and features a unique private stairwell to a natural, shallow swimming enclave in the sea below. Villa Yin's five Thai-style pavilions - the entrance, guest, outdoor, main and master pavilions - are all connected by footpaths, but secluded by design.Delight in the villa’s indoor-outdoor tropical living plan which showcases 4 elegant bedrooms and a 18-meter marble pool that wraps around expansive entertaining platforms along the island’s most prestigious west coast location. Villa Yin is an ideal luxury retreat for families as well as private and corporate groups. Sauna, massage room and home cinema all add to the beautifully appointed outdoor dining and chill out area with a 18-meter marble pool and expansive entertaining platforms.Villa Yin fuses bold antiques such as 14th and 15th century Thai Buddhas, and ancient Burmese gongs, with modern works by artists Xiu Ciu Wen, David LaChapelle and Andy Warhol. The attention to detail is astounding. Sleek materials such as dark hardwood terracing, marble and granite highlight the unique design statements introduced throughout the property. The state-of-the-art Villa Yin Italian kitchen has European flair in abundance. The villa comes with the services of a Thai Chef who will use his expertise and knowledge of local produce to deliver lunches and dinners that will bring your taste buds to life.Each of the bedrooms have ensuite facilities and access to a deck with blissful ocean vistas. These decks provide an incredible space to sit and enjoy a coffee or juice each morning or perhaps a romantic nightcap once the sun has set on another day in paradise. Villa Yin accommodates a maximum of 10 guests and children are very welcome.Some of Phuket's best restaurants are within easy reach – as well as Thai food, you can enjoy Italian, French, Japanese and many other types ranging from smart exotic settings to casual dining, often with a sea view.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description: From its prestigious perch on the hills of Bo Phut, this luxurious six bedroom home enjoys panoramic views of the lush Koh Samui valley and distant sea. With spacious interiors, a functional balcony lounge, and a large swimming pool, Noloom Hills is the perfect setting for a private family getaway, couples retreat, or high-end corporate event. Ten minutes from home, you’ll find the sandy shores of Bo Phut Beach, Royal Samui Golf Club, and the quaint shops and restaurants of Fisherman’s Village.Light and airy, this modern villa uses view-framing glass and wide openings to the terrace to invite fresh sea breeze and natural sunlight to flow freely within. The many indoor/outdoor sitting areas provide more than enough space for group gatherings, as well as places to sneak away for more intimate moments. The villa’s fully equipped kitchen is decked out in state of the art appliances, making it easy to unforgettable dinner parties. Each bedroom comes with a lavish ensuite bathroom. And, all but one have direct access to an outdoor space.Noloom Hills is outfitted with Smart television and Wi-Fi, should you decide to stay connected. The incredibly scenic terrace features great spots for working on your tan, as well as shady areas to enjoy your morning coffee while you look over the valley below. During your stay, you’ll have full-time security, a villa manager, airport transfer, and chef service for lunches.Thailand is well known for its pristine beaches, beautiful golf courses, historical sites, and vibrant nightlife. Within about thirty-kilometers, you’ll be able to visit Koh Samui’s most prized attractions, including Big Buddha Temple, Nathon Pier, and the World famous Nikki Beach. For a night on the town, the Nathon Night Food Market is an exciting place to try out different Thai cuisine, and dance the night away in Nathon’s bars and nightclubs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Gardenia is a stunning beachfront home within the Miskawaan Estate on the north coast of Koh Samui. A luxury hamlet of eleven villas on Maenam and Bangrak beaches, Miskawaan offers an extraordinary venue for weddings, special occasions, or family reunions at a serene remove from the island's popular resorts. Your villa blends vintage Thai elegance with high-end modern comforts, featuring a private swimming pool, exquisite living and dining areas, and a superb staff including a talented chef. Five spacious bedroom suites offer ideal accommodations for ten guests.The estate enjoys 27 meters of absolute beach frontage and panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand. Multiple pavilions form a symmetrical bay around the terracotta-framed saltwater pool. Stylish loungers invite you to savor the South Pacific sun in the dappled shade of dreamy palms, while a small stairway leads to the beach's soft white sands. A kayak is available for excursions across the glittering expanse, and an outdoor shower greets you upon returning for delicious refreshments and meals.There are two adjacent dining areas: a beachfront pavilion with expansive ocean vistas, and an interior table overlooking the pool. The main salon features high, vaulted ceilings, comfortable furnishings, and a high-end television. With extraordinary paintings and artisanal design pieces adorning the luminous walls, the villa's décor is at once vibrant and timeless, embodying age-old traditions while focusing your attention on the present moment.The master suite enjoys a privileged perch opening to the pool terrace and a beachfront veranda. An interior lounge and television accompany the king bed, and its deluxe marble bathroom includes a shower and bathtub. Two of the guestrooms include king beds and two include pairs of twin beds or split kings. All open directly to the outdoor living areas and feature ensuite bathrooms, air conditioning, and safes.Its name meaning "Buddha's gardens," Misawaan Estates offers an extraordinary balance of privacy and convenience. Your staff can help you plan a wide array of activities nearby, from watersports to cooking classes, yoga retreats to Muay Thai lessons, waterfall zip-lining to "Frisbee golf." Royal Samui Golf is within easy reach, and the island abounds in gorgeous temples and natural splendors.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take in the wooded coastline and blue expanse of the Gulf of Thailand from this hilltop Koh Samui mansion. Bathed in sunshine, the stylish interiors and clean, lengthy terrace that ensures guests can soak up lots of island sunshine. Touches like the comfortable wrap-around couches, pool table and epic-sized kitchen will delight guests, with beaches, zipline waterfalls and welcoming towns nearby. Begin the day on the shaded terrace of Villa Marella, sipping on fresh juice as the sun plays with shades of blue and white in the depths of the inviting pool. From its raised location, the home receives a pleasant maritime breeze, which plays amongst the branches of the young trees that punctuate the terrace. Inside, colorful, rainbow designs help the interior pop with style, hanging alongside premium furniture as air-conditioning ensures that guests can bask in the ideal temperature. The billiards table, immersive home cinema and full entertainment system ensures that guests can choose the recreation that best suits their particular tastes.Located in the popular north of the island, Villa Marella offers rapid access to some of the most storied beaches on the island, including the white sand expanse of Thongson Bay. Numerous striking examples of the island’s rich Buddhist culture abound, including towering temples and seaside statues that are open to visitors. For those feeling more adventurous, take to the waves for a day cruise or water scooter outing from the nearby sea sports locations, with thrilling zip-lining over cascading waterfalls also close by.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Samayra is an oceanfront villa located on the idyllic Thai-island paradise of Koh Samui. Located beside the prestigious Viewpoint Landmark, this resplendent abode is just a three minute walk from the fantastic beaches and exciting nightlife of Chaweng. The ultra-modern design and seaside location of Villa Samayra makes it a perfect destination for weddings, birthdays, anniversaries and other special celebrations. Welcome to Koh Samui!Villa Samayra offers 180-degree vistas of the coastline, coconut lined beachfronts and ocean. The grounds include an infinity lap pool, koi pond and a huge sun terrace. At night, the villa flourishes with an entertainment deck illuminated by an LED lighting system that offers a selection of five different color-settings so the mood is always just right. A limestone staircase bends along the terrace of the master bedroom and onto the final seaside level. Another wooden deck below guides you past a gym, steam room and an outdoor rain shower. From here, a stone footpath meanders down to the rocky coast where fishing and nature spotting are two popular activities.Villa Samayra’s interiors provide an additional wow factor. The lounge, dining area and kitchen pavilion feature two luxurious Jim Thompson sofas alongside a handcrafted wooden lounge table facing a 52-inch Sony LCD Television with surround sound and satellite television connection. A large, handcrafted dining table seats twelve and features a centerpiece of chic, candlelit ornaments. Guests can enjoy observing their meals being prepared by the private chef included with your reservation. You may even try your own hand at Thai cooking!All of the bedrooms feature ensuite bathrooms, air conditioning, televisions, DVD players, terrace access and picturesque sea views. The master suite includes a chic, white, four post bed that almost appears to be floating on turquoise waters.Villa Samayra is situated in a convenient location directly between the picturesque beaches and exciting night life of Chaweng and Lamai, making this villa an excellent choice for those who wish to be away from the hustle and bustle of town centers, but also within easy distance of all the island fun and activities. You will also be just minutes away from the Royal Samui Golf & Country Club. Go ahead, take a swing!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Carved into the cliff face in the quiet and protected development of Jomchang at the end of Millionaire’s Mile, Villa Wang Nam Jai is one of the most exclusive retreats in Phuket. Spanning five floors, this superior vacation home can be presented as a one-bedroom grand villa or a four-bedroom mansion depending on the size and preferences of your group. Sensational ocean views are a uniting feature of every room and there are plenty of common areas and inspiring terraces where you can meet with friends, dine al fresco or just lose yourself in the view.As you approach the villa’s gates, grand wooden doors welcome you into a lookout point facing a breathtaking vista of Patong and the Andaman Sea. Water features flow gracefully down each side of the staircase and beautiful white flowers fall from the frangipani trees as you are guided along a path into the main living space. On the top floor you can work out or adopt your yoga poses as you admire the bird’s eye view from the fitness center. The media and entertainment room on the lower floor is ideal for families - there’s a pool table, a library full of books and a television with surround sound. You can step outside from here to the barbecue terrace and mirror-like infinity pool which seems to dissolve straight into the ocean. Follow a magically illuminated path down through the trees to the shore where you can swim or snorkel to your heart’s content.Wang Nam Jai combines visual elements of Asian style architecture with a Western design and full-length sliding glass doors and vaulted wooden ceilings lend the rooms an air of liberty and affluence.The doors in the main living room can be retracted to allow fresh sea breezes to flow through while you watch the yachts drift across the bay from the comfort of a plush sofa. A spotless ultra-modern kitchen encourages you to whip up a feast for your family and you can choose to dine indoors or outside on the terrace.All four en-suite bedrooms enjoy magnificent views through sliding glass doors, and access to a private balcony - the ideal morning coffee spot. Take a rain shower or relax in the large tub before slipping under the covers of your king-size bed.Although you have everything you need for the vacation of a lifetime at your villa, if you want to travel further afield you are surrounded by beaches, golf courses and shopping. Phuket International Airport is 32 km.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spend days on the powdery sands of Nai Thon Beach and nights watching the sun set into the Andaman Sea at Malaiwana Duplex. Perched on a hillside at the exclusive Malaiwana estate, this contemporary vacation rental feels like a private escape but is close to golf, spas, beach clubs and even the Phuket airport. And with four suite-style bedrooms, this luxury property can accommodate up to eight friends and family members on a tropical escape.The duplex opens to a terrace facing the water with a pool that seems to spill into the sea, a pergola-covered lounge area set into the pool, sitting and dining areas, and a barbecue. Slide open the doors to the indoor living spaces and create one seamless indoor-outdoor entertaining area complete with wine fridge, media room, TVs and Wi-Fi.The villa’s sleek, open-concept great room is lined on one side with a glass wall framing sea views. Stretch out in the sitting area, seat eight for dinner at the formal table and serve everything from snacks to multi-course meals from the fully equipped kitchen. Pieces like tuxedo-style sofas and a pedestal dining table have streamlined modern appeal, while details like colorful artwork and marble countertops add personality.Each of the four bedrooms at Malaiwana Duplex has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and direct terrace access; two of the suites have their own dressing and lounge areas as well. Like the great room, the bedrooms are understated yet chic, with clean-lined furnishings that let the expansive views be the focus.Whether you’re in Thailand for beach time, an active holiday or a sunny honeymoon, you’ll find plenty to see and do close to Malaiwana. Perhaps the biggest attraction is Nai Thon Beach, just down the hill from the duplex, where you can sunbathe on the soft sands, swim or snorkel, and try fresh seafood from local vendors. Play a round at the nearby golf course, book a treatment at the nearby spa or reserve a spot on a fishing or sailing excursion from the Royal Phuket Marina.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located minutes from Phuket’s coast, Villa Samakee is a spacious vacation home, ideal for a large family getaway or a special event like an anniversary, corporate retreat, or wedding. This tropical property’s privacy is provided by tall palm trees and lush greenery. And, although it’s well hidden, Samakee is just two minutes from the gorgeous Dream Beach Club.Everything has its place at Villa Samakee. Designed to accentuate the relaxing vibes of its tropical environment, Samakee is perfectly laid out for a free-flowing, yet functional, vacation. And, with plenty of openings to the terrace, it’s easy to fill the interior spaces with natural sunlight and fresh ocean air. The living spaces are warm and inviting, with bright local art on the walls and comfortable designer furniture. The kitchen features high-end stainless steel appliances, a bright and cheery atmosphere, and plenty of countertop workspace.Should we eat inside or outside tonight? That’s probably the toughest question you’ll have to answer while staying at Villa Samakee, and in this tropical climate, there’s no wrong choice. Inside, there’s formal dining for twelve, satellite television, DVD player and library, and a sound system. Outside, there’s alfresco dining for eight, several lounge areas, sun beds, a barbecue, balcony, and an infinity swimming pool. Also included with rental, you’ll have a private chef, housekeeping, and twenty-four hour security.Three of Samakee’s bedrooms come equipped with full en-suite bathrooms, while the final two share a Jack and Jill en-suite. The master bedroom features a king sized bed, full tub, dual vanity, walk-in closet, and a private balcony.Nearby, there’s even more beach access at Layan Beach. If there’s a golfer in the group, Laguna Phuket Golf Club is just five minutes away, as is the Banyan Tree Spa, perfect for a relaxing afternoon. For some fun in the city, Phuket is about twenty minutes from Samakee. There, you’ll find delicious local restaurants, boutique shops, and a vibrant nightlife scene.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched amongst lush tropical greenery, above cliffs that lead down to private beachfront, Villa Beige offers incredible ocean views and access to some of Thailand’s most secluded sandy shoreline. Just follow the private beach path down, and you’ll have barrier-free access to the ocean any time you please. Back up the cliffs, Villa Beige offers its guests four ocean-view en-suite bedrooms, spacious indoor/outdoor area, and a friendly staff to help make all your vacation dreams come true.Villa Beige’s open concept living room contains the lounge, dining area, and wet bar within its social, ocean-facing environment. Swing open the floor-to-ceiling glass doors and the inside and outside blend seamlessly, allowing fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to embrace Beige’s large common space. Throughout the villa, you’ll find sleek and stylish furniture, modern decor, and a soothing creamy color palette, perfect for that relaxing beach house atmosphere. Unique spaces like the home theatre, steam sauna, and office ensure that guests will always find somewhere secluded to enjoy some private time, as well as gather as a group.On the terrace, beach chairs, umbrellas, and tropical greenery surround the infinity pool and lounge spaces. Inside, you’ll have Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a computer, and baby equipment. There’s also a staff consisting of a security guard, butler, spa therapist, and a cook. There are dining areas inside and out, both with seating for eight.The nearest town to Villa Beige is located just three-minutes inland. You’ll find grocery stores, restaurants, and boutique shops in the small town of Baan Taling Ngam. If you’ve got some extra energy to burn, Villa Beige has a home exercise room, or you could head five-minutes from home to the nearby tennis courts. If there’s a golfer in your group, Royal Samui and Santiburi Country Club feature two of Thailand’s best courses, both are within a half hour’s drive.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A private oasis of calm and tranquility, Atulya Residence features gardens landscaped by the renowned designer Bill Bensley. Creative touches enhance the individuality and bespoke customization that defines this Zen-like retreat. Just minutes from the beach and in the magnificent setting of Bophut Hills, this luxury vacation rental is a superb base from which to explore the beauty of Koh Samui.The expansive outside area features a 65-foot infinity swimming pool, a swim-up bar, outdoor sound system, open air dining and relaxing day beds. Enjoy your favorite cocktail while taking in the breathtaking view! Indoors, you will find a home entertainment unit and an espresso machine. A dedicated staff ensures the best holiday experience. With a private chef on hand day and night, delight in the custom-designed menus meticulously prepared with fresh local produce. Fine wines compliment the authentic Royal Thai cuisine and Western gastronomy. Some perks included with your reservation are à la carte breakfast, daily baked cookies, smoothies and fresh fruit, housekeeping, butler and 24-hour security.Atulya Residence’s layout of spacious pavilions, high vaulted ceilings and sliding glass doors that seamlessly connect the indoor and outdoor spaces is in complete harmony with its natural surroundings. Stylish and comfortable interiors are filled with hand-woven fabrics, traditionally carved furniture and one-off specially commissioned pieces. Elegant furnishings and rich wooden accents offer a sublime setting in which to unwind.Five magnificent bedrooms accommodate up to ten guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the bedrooms offer en-suite bathrooms, dual vanities and televisions. The two master suites offer direct outdoor access. The layout of the villa provides ample space for family and friends to gather, while the pavilions offer privacy for any couples on eternal honeymoon. The picturesque setting and design of Atulya Residence has also made it a favorite for weddings and other events.For gurus and initiates alike, near your villa, you will find The Yogarden where you can indulge in warm days of yoga and meditation. The Bophut fisherman’s village is also a great place to lounge, eat or shop. Also minutes away is the famed Santiburi Samui golf course, a key stop on the PGA tour. However you spend your days in Koh Samui, soak in the tropical breeze at Atulya Residence and go home refreshed and rejuvenated like never before!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched on a hillside amongst lush tropical greenery, this extremely well-appointed luxury rental earns the name Grand Villa with ease. All six of its beautiful bedrooms feature king-sized beds, walk-in closets, private balconies, en-suite bathrooms. Accommodations for twelve, a spacious atmosphere, and its central location make Grand Villa the perfect host for a family vacation, golf trip, retreat, or special event. And, it’s just a few minutes from the beach.Modern Thai architecture is quickly becoming the new standard for tropical luxury homes. The complexity of Grand Villa’s design is subtly downplayed by its greyscale color scheme and clean straight lines, creating a space that is chic, stylish, elegant, and tranquil, all at the same time. The exterior features many openings to the terrace and balconies, ensuring fresh ocean breeze flows freely throughout the interior. The decor is bright and cheerful. Designer furniture, eclectic art, and high-tech electronics fill the indoor spaces. And, the open-concept layout combines the kitchen, living room, lounge, and terrace into one huge social space, great for entertaining.Grand Villa is equipped with Wi-Fi, safes, a sound system, air conditioning, and a washer/dryer. In the kitchen, there’s high-end stainless steel appliances, a coffee machine, dishwasher, and wine fridge.The formal dining area inside has seating for twelve. There’s also furnished dining and living spaces on the terrace. While you’re outside, enjoy views of the beautiful Andaman Sea from the infinity pool, a sun lounger, or rooftop patio.Three kilometers towards the coast, you’ll find Surin Beach. Surrounded by luxury hotels, million dollar vacation homes, and high-end restaurants and wine bars, Surin Beach is a popular spot for wealthy travelers. Golf is popular on Phuket as well, with several scenic courses in Grand Villa’s vicinity. Phuket Golf Centre and Laguna are the two closest course. Both feature challenging hole layouts lined with lush greenery and natural lagoons.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Dahlia is a stunning contemporary waterfront villa on the island of Koh Samui. Situated near Choeng Mon on the island's northeastern shore, the villa is just fifty paces from the nearest beach and enjoys breathtaking, panoramic views of Thongson Bay and the Gulf of Thailand. The villa features extraordinary open-air living and dining areas along with exquisite interiors and top-end amenities. Three superb and ample bedrooms accommodate six guests, perfect for families, multiple couples, or small groups of friends.With a gorgeous infinite swimming pool, ample lounge areas, and the scintillating waves lapping the shore beneath you, the villa's balcony is ideal for savoring the South Pacific sun and breeze. A wall of sliding glass doors joins the balcony and interior living areas, creating a seamless space for relaxation and entertainment. Enjoy dreamy days luxuriating on elegant loungers, floating in the pool's sparkling waters, and sipping cool refreshments in the shaded lounge. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, cook a delicious meal in the fully equipped kitchen, and relish it around the lovely dining table. Sip sunset cocktails in the main lounge while gazing at the horizon, and watch your favorite shows on TV when night falls. Stunning original decorative objects, at once modern and traditional, evoke the timeless beauty of coastal Thailand with consummate style.Each of the bedroom suites echoes the main living area in layout and décor, with a glass wall opening from the room to a furnished terrace. There are two rooms with one king bed each and one room with a queen bed. Each suite includes an ensuite bathroom and is equipped with air conditioning, a safe, and a television. Each enjoys breathtaking ocean views.Villa Dahlia offers a perfect balance of seclusion and proximity to the many pleasures of Koh Samui. Walk literally steps to the beautiful beach beside you, or drive to any number of world-class beaches, including nearby Naturism Beach. There are some excellent restaurants near by and you're a short drive to the fabulous Six Senses Resort, with its extraordinary restaurant on the tip of the peninsula, Dining on the Rocks. Samui Airport is just about five kilometers away, making the villa an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From its mountaintop perch, villa Suralai enjoys incredible views of Samui’s lush canopy and the ocean. With six luxurious en-suite bedrooms, this contemporary villa is perfect for a family beach vacation, a golf trip with friends, and any other occasion worth celebrating in style. Nearby, you’ll have no trouble finding plenty of pristine beachfront along Chaweng’s coast, as well as golf, shopping, restaurants, and adventure tourism.Suralai is the home of the angels in Thai mythology, and that is exactly the vibe at this mountaintop getaway. Decorated with rich wood tones, sleek and stylish furniture, and plenty of floor-to-ceiling glass, Suralai shows off its modern contemporary design, while celebrating its beautiful natural surroundings. The spacious living room opens to the terrace and a spectacular ocean view. An open concept layout encourages a social environment, with the main lounge, dining table, and kitchen all residing under the wood-paneled, vaulted ceiling. In the kitchen, state of the art appliances are seamlessly integrated into the functional workspace against the rear wall. Just in front, a seven-seat bar with built-in wine coolers separates the kitchen area, without closing it off.Outside, Suralai’s covered lounge area is sunken to meet the level of the pool’s built-in bar. Whether you feel like enjoying a cocktail from a bar stool underwater or keeping dry in the lounge, you’ll be able to share the same table with everyone else. Inside, Suralai is outfitted with high-end electronics, air-conditioned bedrooms, a home gym, and Wi-Fi. The villa is staffed with an English speaking manager, maid, handyman, chef that prepares a complimentary daily breakfast.Nearby, at Chaweng Beach, you’ll find six kilometers of gorgeous, sandy coast. The beach is lined with resorts, shopping, restaurants, and vibrant nightlife establishments. After a day on the beach, head to Ark Bar, at Chaweng Beach’s center, to enjoy a refreshing cocktail under the sun. And, if there’s a golfer in your group, Santiburi Golf Course is incredibly scenic and challenging for players of any skill level.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From Villa Abiente’s poolside sun-deck, you’ll enjoy spectacular views of Phuket’s Phang Nga Bay. Leading to the bay, and Cape Yuma’s Beach, you’ll find a walking trail through lush tropical greenery, which will have you on the beach in just five minutes. With three ocean-view bedrooms, Villa Abiente is perfect for a family vacation, couples retreat, or a golf trip with friends. Nearby, you’ll find theist golf on the island, Phuket’s downtown core, and plenty more.White and grey tones, floor-to-ceiling glass, and modern decor combine within Villa Abiente to create a tranquil, relaxing environment that contrasts delightfully with the vibrant blues and greens of Phuket. Fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight fill the open-concept villa, harmoniously blurring the line between inside and out with its wide openings. Features like rock gardens, murals, a floating staircase, and eclectic works of art make Abiente an exciting place to explore and relax.Inside, Abiente is equipped with high-end electronics, Wi-Fi, sound system, and television. The villa is air-conditioned, and there are several ceiling fans to circulate fresh tropical breeze. On the terrace, several furnished living and dining areas surround the infinity pool. And, there’s a barbecue, great for grilling up something fresh From a local market. And, complimentary with your reservation, you’ll have access to Cape Yuma’s villa manager, daily breakfast, chef services, housekeeping, and security.Within a thirty-minute drive, you’ll be able to access Laguna, Red Mountain, and Mission Hills, Phuket’s most prestigious golf courses. If you’re looking for some fun on the water or a fishing trip, Boat Lagoon and Royal Phuket marinas are both close by. Downtown, you’ll find fine dining, retail shops, and markets. And, for nightlife, head to Bangla Road, a stretch of closed-off street rich with neon signs, live music, and a great mix of bars, pubs, nightclubs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Panoramic views, a friendly staff and one of the best locations in Phuket welcome you to Villa Phukhao. Built on a hillside above the town of Bang Tao, this luxury Thailand vacation rental offers expansive vistas over the neighboring mountains and the Andaman Sea. With seven suite-style bedrooms and several beaches, golf courses, night markets and more a short drive away, there’s plenty of room and activities for the whole family or a group of friends.Your holiday in Thailand begins with an airport transfer to the villa. During your stay, a full-time chef can prepare both Thai and Western specialties, and an English-speaking property manager can help arrange everything from car and bicycle rentals to an indulgent in-villa massage. The villa is laid out around a deck with a designer infinity pool and a tempting row of sun loungers. Take the staircase up to the rooftop terrace, where the views are even better and there’s an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue, an al-fresco dining area and a sitting area perfect for cocktails before a soak in the hot tub to end the evening.Rendered in steel, white walls and floor-to-ceiling windows—some of which can be folded back—the interiors of Villa Phukhao feel wonderfully connected to the outdoors. Clean-lined furnishings, such as the wood-based sectional and straight-backed dining chairs, get a boost of personality from bright throw pillows and whimsical pieces like model ships and elephant sculptures. In the center of the great room, the fully equipped kitchen intrigues with a colorful space-age lighting system on the breakfast bar.There are six bedrooms with king beds at the villa and one with two twin beds; all seven have en-suite bathrooms with spa-worthy rain showers. Enjoy the views from the four bedrooms that open to a terrace or balcony, or relive your honeymoon in the suite that has its own jetted tub. Crisp white bedding, wall-to-wall windows, and sitting areas or built-in desks give the bedroom suites all the appeal of rooms at a resort, but in a far more private setting.With five beaches within a 16 km drive of the villa, including Surin Beach, Bang Tao Beach and Kamala Beach, you could easily spend your stay taking in the tropical sun and sand. You can also play a round at Laguna Golf Phuket, 6 km away, set sail from Royal Phuket Marina, 16 km away, spend an afternoon exploring Old Town Phuket, 25 km away or marvel at beautiful Wat Chalong Temple, 30 km away. Be sure to grab a late-night bite at Bangla Night Plaza, 16 km away, or Talad Kaset Night Market, 24 km away. When your trip is over, plan on a 22 km drive from Villa Phukhao to Phuket International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: High on a hillside above Surin Beach and the Andaman Sea, Villa Sammasan waits to welcome you. One of eight villas on an exclusive private estate, this luxury Phuket vacation rental offers a beautiful, quiet setting inside and out, but is still within walking distance of two beaches and a short drive from the area’s top must-sees. A full staff and three suite-style bedrooms ensure a comfortable stay for a family or small group of friends.Your stay at Villa Sammasan includes the services of a housekeeper and property manager, and Thai or Western meals from a chef. Spend your holiday soaking in the tropical sun from the sleek white lounge furniture beside the infinity pool overlooking Surin Bay, or reading and napping in the shade of the sala on the pool terrace. Connect to your media and to friends back home with the villa’s iPod dock and Wi-Fi, and if you’re traveling with children, keep them comfortable and safe with the baby cot, high chair and toddler gates.With a wall of windows that fronts the great room and opens to the terrace, the villa almost feels like your own treehouse. The playful mood is enhanced by bright contemporary artwork, a red pouf and a candy-striped rug that are paired with chocolate leather chairs and a sofa in the sitting area. Across the white floor, you’ll find the vibrant dining area, with built-in bookshelves, a quirky metal-topped table and colorful mod-Scandinavian pendant lights. The fully equipped kitchen echoes the dining area’s lights and seating, but in pared-down white.Each of the three bedrooms at Villa Sammasan has an en-suite bathroom and views of the bay. The master bedroom, which takes up the villa’s entire second floor, has a king bed, jetted tub and private balcony. The other two bedrooms, set on a lower level below the main floor, feature steam showers and have a queen bed, and two twin beds and a rollout bed, respectively.If you’re on vacation with family, there’s plenty in the area to delight kids and adults alike, from the nearby mini-golf course at Bangtao Beach and horse and elephant rides, shopping and dining at the Laguna complex to the deli and restaurant just around the corner. If you’re traveling with friends, ask about booking a member rate for golf at the Blue Canyon Country Club or do some shopping at the Surin Plaza boutique mall. On a romantic getaway or honeymoon, stroll along glamorous Surin Beach, a 10-minute walk away, stop at one of the chic beach clubs or sit down to dinner at your choice of the oceanfront restaurants. At the end of your stay, plan on a 14-mile drive from Villa Sammasan to Phuket International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Immerse yourself in the lush greens of the tropical landscape and the brilliant blue of the sea at Seastar Seaview Villa. Perched on a hillside near Bophut with panoramic views, this Koh Samui vacation rental invites you to savour the moment with friends and family with its picture-perfect setting, five-star amenities and beautifully appointed living spaces.You’ll want to spend most of your time on the villa’s terrace, which faces the sea and features an infinity pool, hot tub, loungers, a daybed, a barbecue and a bar-height dining area. Put a favorite album on the sound system, serve refreshments from the wet bar and bask in the tropical sun until it sets. Inside, start a friendly competition around the pool table, share holiday snaps via Wi-Fi or keep up with your routine in the exercise room.A fold-away glass wall links the terrace at Seastar Seaview Villa with the open-plan great room, whose sitting and dining areas and fully equipped kitchen all enjoy panoramic ocean views. The other side of the room opens to an internal courtyard, giving the space an airy feel, and sleek furnishings let the spectacular views take center stage.Each of the four bedrooms at this luxury property has an en-suite bathroom and lounge area, and opens to a private balcony. There is one master suite with a king bed, two bedrooms with queen beds and one bedroom with two twin beds.If you’ve come to Thailand on honeymoon, the villa’s hillside location is perfectly secluded; if you’re vacationing as a family, you’ll find beaches, dining, attractions and more within easy reach, including Chaweng Beach, just a 5-minute drive away. Find the perfect souvenir—or your new favorite food—at Fisherman’s Village, stand in awe at the Big Buddha Temple or tee off at the Royal Samui golf course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Gorgeous art and architecture meet unparalleled scenery at Celadon Villa. Set high above the waters around Koh Samui just west of the laid-back Maenam Beach, this four-bedroom hilltop vacation rental will elevate a family holiday, birthday celebration or even a decadent honeymoon to an experience of true Thai luxury.Take in the views of the Gulf of Thailand, Angthong Marine Park and neighboring islands from outdoor living areas with a wraparound infinity pool, sunken sitting area, a shaded dining area, a barbecue and a sound system. For the kids, there are table tennis and badminton set-ups, plus a media room with satellite TV. During your stay, a villa manager, Thai and Western chef, and housekeeper will ensure that you’re completely at ease.Sleek and spacious, the living and dining areas of Celadon Villa exude contemporary style. Neutral tones feel refined and modern, while original artwork adds interest to rival the spectacular views. Though chef service is included in your reservation, the villa does have a fully equipped kitchen that’s open to the other living areas.Celadon has three bedrooms with king size beds and one bedrooms with two twin beds. All four bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms and air conditioning, and open to a private terrace. Chic details such as bold wallpaper, Lucite lamps or four-poster beds lend personality to each of the suites.Spend your days relaxing at the villa or make the short drive down the hill to Bang Por Beach, a quiet, sandy stretch lined with palms where you can swim year-round. For a taste of local specialties or to browse for souvenirs, make the 15-minute drive to Fisherman’s Village in Bophut. For a livelier scene, make the 25-minute drive to Chaweng or the 30-minute drive to popular Nikki Beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched on the secluded hillside between Chaweng and Lamai, 180 Samui offers unprecedented privacy even though it’s just a few minutes from beaches, golf, historic sites, and the city. With the name 180, you’d expect panoramic ocean views, and you’d be correct in your assumption. 180’s ocean view is incomparable. All five bedrooms have an incredible vista of the Gulf of Thailand, as does each common space, dining area, and even the gym. With its free-flowing atmosphere, 180 is perfect for hosting a special event like a wedding, engagement party, family reunion, or anything else worth celebrating in style.180’s sleek and stylish exterior provides the perfect contrast to Thailand’s lush tropical hillside setting. Designed to promote an open-air ambiance, 180 has floor-to-ceiling openings uncovering nearly every inch of its ocean-facing exterior. At its center, the infinity-edge swimming pool provides a perfect place to relax and gaze upon the ocean view. The pool terrace opens on one side to the dining area, with seating for ten, and the ultra-modern kitchen. On the other side, the living room, with its billiards table, state of the art electronics, and its lounge area, which is sunken, so your sightline is level with the ocean view.During your stay, you and your guests will appreciate the many living and dining areas, both indoors and outdoors that are spread across 180’s four levels. The villa is equipped with Wi-Fi, air conditioning, Smart TVs, an espresso machine, parking, and security. And, there’s a private chef available, with several optional packages to help cater your special event.Nearby, in Chaweng, you’ll love exploring the white sandy beach, especially at low-tide when its two small islands and natural reef system are accessible by foot. For fine dining, spas, and golf, stick to the area around the coast, as it is mainly populated with luxury hotels and resorts. If you’re interested in bars, shopping, and exciting nightlife, head to the central downtown area of Chaweng, you won’t be disappointed.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This stunning luxury villa on the southeast coast of Koh Samui is perched directly above the water near Chaweng Beach. A unique architectural gem with wonderful amenities and astonishing views, the villa will inspire you to "seize the day" during your group's adventure to this island paradise. Special features include two infinity swimming pools, an open-air hot tub, an ocean-view gym, and a fabulous gourmet kitchen, along with deluxe services provided by a talented staff. Four capacious bedroom suites with king beds and ensuite bathrooms form an ideal abode for families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to eight in size.Nestled amid 3,000 square meters of lush gardens, the villa's terraces invite you to savor the outdoor delights of Koh Samui. Bask in the sunlight on lounge chairs and dip into the turquoise pools. Sip cocktails at the swim-up bar or in the cool, shaded lounge while gazing at the breathtaking vistas. Gather for alfresco meals in the enchanting breeze, and linger outdoors in the evening, marveling at sunset and stars.Wide thresholds fuse the upper terrace with the main interior living areas, creating a graceful flow of space and sea-kissed air. The superb modern kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, and easily serves the terrace, dining patio, and interior dining table (with seating for ten). There is also a lovely lounge area and a separate entertainment room with pool table and TV. The hot tub is perched within a quiet niche with beautiful jungle views.Each bedroom offers a superb haven for couples or individual travelers, with a king bed, private outdoor living area, sea view, air conditioning, TV, and ensuite bathroom. The bathrooms have high-end rain showers with body jets, and three include soaking tubs as well. The stunning master suite additionally features a private lounge.The villa offers a wonderful balance of lofty seclusion and convenient access to the island's top attractions, including the nearby towns of Chaweng and Lamai. You're about four minutes from Royal Samui Golf Club, and a short drive from several renowned beaches.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Jaliza is an exquisite luxury villa overlooking the Gulf of Thailand near Chaweng, on the world-renowned resort island of Koh Samui. With beautiful ocean views and gorgeous design blending contemporary lines, sumptuous comfort, and Buddhist-inspired décor, this six-bedroom vacation rental gives you a private sanctuary within easy reach of the island's beaches, golf courses, and precious rainforests.Elegantly nestled amid lush flora on a hilltop overlooking the sea, the villa features a lovely infinite swimming pool and spectacular vistas of the shoreline, rainforests, coconut groves, and turquoise waters. You'll relax on elegant sun loungers on the pool deck, and withdraw into the lovely, traditional pavilion with sala lounge for meditation and afternoon tea. In the evening, relish a sunset dinner together at the alfresco dining table, as the gurgling fountain and impressive stone Buddha inspire openness and presence.From the pool terrace, wall-length glass doors open to the villa's cool interior. Here, the sumptuous, ocean-view lounge with large sectional couch and mounted flat screen TV is ideal for evenings and nights together with friends and family. The open plan interior also includes an elegant dining table and a kitchen fully equipped with chef grade appliances, as well as a breakfast bar and large glass doors opening to the terrace. The interior area is luminous throughout, with beautiful wooden doors and original paintings on the walls. Downstairs, there is an ocean-view game room with pool table.The upstairs landing welcomes you with a traditional vaulted ceiling of lovely wood and gallery-worthy sculptures and paintings. The six bedrooms include four with king size beds, one with two twin beds, and one with two double size beds. Five of the six bedrooms include balconies with ocean views, and all of the rooms have ensuite bathrooms. The master bedroom is particularly ample and stunning, with vaulted wooden ceilings, a lounge area, a classic vanity, wide ocean views, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub.At Villa Jaliza, you're perfectly placed for exploring the island's towns, natural beauty, and Buddhist heritage. Fisherman's Village and the town of Chaweng are both just minutes away by car, while Chaweng Beach, Chaweng Noi Beach, and Bophut Beach are also nearby—perfect for a sunset swim.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From views over the perfectly palm-fringed Nai Thon Beach to spectacular sunsets over the Andaman Sea, Malaiwana Penthouse will leave you breathless. Perched on a hillside on the northwest coast of Phuket, this serene four-bedroom vacation rental makes an ideal escape for up to eight friends and family members. And though the surroundings make it feel like your own private tropical idyll, this luxury property is close to golf, spas, beach clubs and even the airport.The penthouse’s glass doors slide open to an incredible terrace with loungers, a barbecue, a pergola-covered sitting area, an al-fresco dining area and a heated infinity pool that seems to spill into the sea. After a day on the terrace or the beach, treat yourself to a glass from the wine fridge and a favorite show or movie in the villa’s media room, or post photos from your holiday via Wi-Fi.Thanks to the wall of sliding glass doors, it’s easy to open the penthouse’s open-concept living areas to the terrace, creating one seamless indoor-outdoor space. The sleek great room is stylish yet understated, with mod pieces that make a chic statement without trying to outdo the views. Catch up on reading on the tuxedo-style sofas, relive the day’s adventures around the pedestal dining table or sip an espresso from the machine at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Each of the four bedrooms at Malaiwana Penthouse has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and direct terrace access; two of the four have their own lounge areas as well. Spectacular views, crisp white bedding and spa-worthy bathrooms splashed in marble make the bedrooms into luxe retreats to rival any honeymoon suite.While it’s tempting to simply spend a stay relaxing by the pool, it’s well worth the short walk or buggy ride down the hill from the villa to Nai Thon Beach, where you can sunbathe on the soft sand, swim or snorkel in the clear, warm water, or sample fresh seafood from local vendors. Book a tee time at the nearby golf course or a treatment at one of several spas close by, or set off on a fishing or sailing excursion from the Royal Phuket Marina.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Naam Sawan is a stunning luxury villa on the northern shore of Phuket, Thailand. Situated in the Cape Yamu Estate—developed by Philippe Starck and Jean-Michel Gathy—the villa is within walking distance of the estate's exclusive beach, and enjoys an ideal balance of seaside seclusion and convenient proximity to numerous attractions and golf clubs. Extraordinary alfresco living areas, exquisite interiors, and four deluxe bedrooms suites create an outstanding vacation rental for families, friends, and destination wedding guests.Surrounded by lush tropical forest, the villa's ample terrace and lawn invite you to dreamy days in the South Pacific sun. Luxuriate on elegant loungers, plunge into the sparkling swimming pool, and sip cool refreshments at the swim-up bar. Returning from the beach, gather in the dining pavilion for a delicious barbeque lunch. In the evening, relish the breathtaking views from the sumptuous lounge on the upper terrace.An open wall joins the upper terrace with the spectacular great room, inviting sublime ocean views into the home. With high, vaulted ceilings of pickled wood, beautiful Buddhist artwork, and superb furnishings, the great room sets the stage for enchanting evenings together. Sip cocktails in the ample lounge while gazing through two-story windows at expansive vistas. Enjoy feasts at the beautiful dining table for ten, and gather in the home theater at night. The gourmet kitchen, located on the ground floor, is fully equipped and easily serves the pool terrace and great room. The lovely table beside it is perfect for breakfast overlooking the pool and sea.Each of the four bedroom suites is like a luxury apartment in itself, with king bed, ensuite bathroom, lounge area, desk, television, safe, and direct terrace access. One of the king beds can be separated into two twins, creating an ideal suite for kids.Naam Sawan enjoys an extaordinary location for relishing the riches of Phucket. Literally steps from Cape Yamu Beach, you're also within easy reach of two piers and three marinas, allowing you to explore the neighboring islands and beaches of Phang Nga Bay. Bango Tao Beach and Surin Beach are easily reachable by car. The extraordinary Bong Pae waterfall within Khao Phra Thaeo National Park is nine kilometers away, while Phuket Town is about twenty.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Stay in a private residence in a setting worthy of a luxury hotel at Villa Loxley. This gorgeous Koh Samui vacation rental is located next to the stunning Six Senses Hotel in Bophut, within view of sunsets and the sea. An attentive staff and five bedrooms are waiting to welcome parties of up to ten friends or a group of extended family.Your holiday at Villa Loxley begins with an airport transfer and a fruit plate, and includes daily breakfast plus the services of a villa manager and housekeeper. Spend lazy days lounging by the pool, listening to favorite albums on the outdoor sound system while barbecuing in the al-fresco kitchen or enjoying the villa’s private beach access. Inside, the property also features a wet bar, games room, smart TV, Wi-Fi and elevator.Cool and contemporary, the villa’s interiors take their inspiration from both Thai style and modern design. The house is laid out around an open-concept great room with living and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen, all linked to the pool terrace—and the sea views—via sliding glass doors.Each of the villa’s five bedrooms is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, jetted tub, Apple TV and air conditioning. Three of the suites have their own furnished terraces facing the sea, and the other two bedrooms share a water-view terrace.Villa Loxley is just steps from Plai Laem, putting one of Koh Samui’s quietest, most romantic beaches at your doorstep, and an 8-minute walk from Samrong Bay Beach. For resort amenities or dinner at the award-winning Dining on the Rocks restaurant, step next door to the five-star Six Senses Hotel. Golf, shopping, dining and nightlife are all only a short drive away along the main street of Bophut.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This villa, located on Koh Samui, offers an exquisite contemporary interpretation of classic Thai architecture and style. Featuring extraordinary indoor, alfresco living areas, four deluxe bedrooms, and spectacular ocean views, Raku is an ideal vacation rental for sophisticated travelers and families seeking a unique yet quintessential experience of one of the most breathtaking locations in Thailand and Southeast Asia.Situated literally steps from the sea and nestled amid lush tropical flora, this estate gazes out on panoramic vistas of the Gulf of Thailand, Angthong Marine Park, Koh Phangan and Koh Tao. Savor luxurious days in the South Pacific sun, relaxing on elegant sunbeds and bathing in the beautiful, L-shaped swimming pool. In the afternoon, descend to the white-sand beach and plunge into the surf, then return for a delicious barbeque lunch on the terrace. At sunset, sip cocktails in the sumptuous lounge, gazing on the stunning expanse of sky and sea.The interior Great Room features open walls to the pool terrace as well as the garden, inviting a steady ocean breeze into the home. Gather around the beautiful, custom-made dining table for eight under a stunning chandelier, and relish a delicious Thai meal prepared by your live-in private chef. After dinner, sip digestifs and feel the night breeze in the indoor or outdoor lounges. Numerous amenities and services, including a property manager, daily housecleaning, complimentary breakfast, excellent AV equipment, and safes in every bedroom ensure total comfort and peace of mind.Raku features three king bedrooms and a fourth room with two double-sized bunk beds, perfect for kids. All of the rooms have ensuite bathrooms, desks, and lounge areas, and all open directly to the terrace, creating a dreamy setting for breeze-kissed siestas and tranquil nights. Accommodating eight, Raku is ideal for destination wedding guests.Raku’s location gives you outstanding proximity to beaches, towns, golf clubs, and precious natural beauty. Several outstanding beaches and seaside towns, including Nathon, Chawent, Bophut, and Lipa Noi, are within minutes by car. Santiburi Samui Country Club, with its world-class, eighteen-hole course, is less than ten kilometers away, while the iconic Big Budda Temple is also within easy reach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Great views, resort-worthy amenities and an attentive staff are all part of the experience at Villa Enjoy. This perfectly named Phuket vacation rental is ideal for adventurous groups of friends or an active family, and its Patong location puts you close to beaches, shopping, dining and more. Five bedrooms and sleek, sophisticated interiors can welcome up to ten guests in contemporary luxury.Your holiday at Villa Enjoy includes the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper and property manager. Features like a huge swimming pool, rooftop plunge pool, badminton court, plus exercise, boxing and game rooms cater to the active; for everyone else, there are outdoor lounging and dining areas with beautiful views, Apple TV and Wi-Fi.Walls of glass mean you can also enjoy the views of Patong and the surrounding hills from the villa’s spacious open-concept interiors. The heart of the home is a great room with a sitting area, dining table for twelve and a fully equipped kitchen, but you’ll find the same modern furnishings, luxe textures and vibrant artwork both here and in the rest of the villa.Villa Enjoy has three bedrooms with queen beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a lounge area and private balcony, as well as two bedrooms with king beds. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans, and open to an outdoor space.Not only do the villa’s amenities offer plenty of entertainment, its Kathu location makes it easy to reach some of the best of Phuket’s beaches, shopping, dining, golf and more. It’s just a short drive to Patong Beach and a little farther to Karon Beach for a day on the sand, and at night, it’s well worth making the short trip into downtown Patong for dinner or a drink.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spend an idyllic holiday on the shores of one of Koh Samui’s quietest beaches at Baan Wanora. Set amid lush gardens and tranquil water features, this beautiful oceanfront vacation rental makes a picturesque backdrop for a tropical getaway with friends or family. Its six bedrooms and attentive staff offer total relaxation to parties of up to thirteen.Your stay at Baan Wanora includes a round-trip airport transfer, daily Western and Asian breakfast, and private chef service. Soak in the tropical sun in outdoor living areas with an adults’ pool with a swim-up bar, children’s pool and plenty of loungers, plus waterfalls and fish ponds. Other amenities range from an indoor bar and games collection to satellite television and Wi-Fi.The villa’s gorgeous open-sided living areas make the most of the warm weather and ocean views. Spread out in open-concept living and dining areas, where a cathedral ceiling and Buddha statue are classic Thai touches, or take coffee and chats out onto the shaded veranda. While chef service is included in your stay, the villa does have a kitchen with a microwave, blender, coffee machine and more.This luxury property has four bedrooms with king beds, including two master suites, and one bedroom with a queen bed; all five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, mini-bars and ocean views. The sixth bedroom has two twin beds and adjoins another room with a twin bed as well as an en-suite bathroom, making it perfect for children and a nanny.With the white sands of Laem Sor just in front of Baan Wanora, it couldn’t be easier to bring the kids out for a day of building sandcastles or to relive your honeymoon with a stroll by the water. If you’d like to see more of the area, walk down to the ornate Laem Sor Pagoda or make the 10-minute drive to shopping and dining options in the town of Lamai.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: An infinity pool stretches the length of the house and the Gulf of Thailand stretches to the horizon at this fully staffed hilltop home on Koh Samui’s northwest coast. Loungers on the terrace waits expectantly for sunset, and steps over the pool lead to a play pavilion with a pool table. Drive 4 minutes downhill to quiet Laem Noi Beach or 9 minutes to everything from coffee to pizza in Nathon. Your holiday begins with an airport transfer and includes access to a gym along with staff services. Active guests can perfect their serve on the private tennis court; everyone else can perfect their tan on the loungers and in the pool. After watching the sunset over dinner from the barbecue, head inside to the home theater and wet bar, or challenge friends and family around the pool table. This luxury property is bright and airy, thanks to an open-concept layout, blond-wood floors, crisp white walls, and glass panels framing sea views. Open the doors to the terrace to let the breeze waft over a generous sectional in the sitting area and a dining table for 12. Though chef service is included in your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Each of the six bedrooms at this vacation rental has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; several also have a furnished private balcony or lounge area. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are simple yet stunning, with soaring ceilings, streamlined furnishings, and massive stone bathtubs. The villa is less than a 5-minute drive from the nearest beach, but there are plenty more choices just a little farther away, from Mae Nam Beach, where you’ll find both families playing in the sand and couples on honeymoon, to ever-popular Bophut Beach. Be sure to stop by Nathon on Saturday nights for a pedestrian market on the waterfront plaza. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
