listing.listing_description: Find serenity, romance or just plain fun at beautiful Baan Paa Talee. The luxury nine-bedroom villa, whose name translates to “house on the cliff by the ocean,” was designed by renowned architect Arne Charpentier and is spread out over several oceanfront pavilions above the Andaman Sea, making it ideal for a large family or a honeymoon escape. Host an unforgettable event like a tropical wedding in the spacious, contemporary indoor and outdoor living areas or spend your stay just enjoying the balmy Phuket weather at one of the nearby beaches.Your stay at Baan Paa Talee starts with a transfer from the airport and includes the services of a chef, cook and housekeeper. Adults will appreciate the saltwater infinity pool, jetted tub, sunny lounge areas and massage table, while kids will want to explore the two-story treehouse and play at the pool and ping-pong tables. See the area on the villa’s bicycles or stay close to home and stroll the lush gardens or take the stairs down to the ocean. At the end of the day, rinse off in the al-fresco shower and prep local produce on the barbecue before sitting down to a meal at the outdoor dining area.The villas’ pavilions are distinguished by peaked roofs, open or fold-back glass walls, and neutral tones, giving them a breezy, contemporary feel. The clean-lined furnishings—think sleek armless sofas, stools and chaise longues—are contrasted by warm wood accents and the organic shapes of metal sculptures. But the living spaces are also distinguished by their generous proportions, with room enough for everyone on the living room sectionals, around the dining table or in the state-of-the-art, fully equipped kitchen.There are five bedrooms in the main villa area at Baan Paa Talee and two in the guest house closer to the ocean; all have at least one king bed and most have en-suite bathrooms. Thanks to the property’s traditional layout, many of the main-villa bedrooms are in their own private pavilions. And in the guest house, the two bedrooms share a living room and kitchenette, making it perfect for couples who want an even more intimate holiday.Book your ticket to the Phuket airport, 32 km from Baan Paa Talee. Be sure to bring sunscreen and sandals, since this Kamala vacation rental is less than a 10 km drive from some of the area’s best beaches, including Kamala Beach, Patong Beach and Surin Beach. Get a taste of the local culture at the Phuket FantaSea dinner show, 6 km away, pick up souvenirs at Jungceylon, 9 km away, or Central Festival Phuket, 17 km away, and set aside an afternoon to explore Phuket’s old town, 25 km away.Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Approached by a private driveway and surrounded by wide, lawned tropical beachside gardens, Baan Taley Rom offers guests an attractive, modern and very private luxury residence with stunning views from almost every room out across the glittering waters of Andaman Sea.An ideal choice for large families or groups of friends looking for the ultimate beach house; the villa boasts 60 metres of undisturbed beach frontage and offers an appealing combination of in- and outdoor spaces to relax, get active, dine or party in an exclusive private setting. The beachfront lawn is also perfectly suited to private functions, making the villa an excellent choice for an oceanside wedding.Baan Taley Rom's generous living, dining and recreation rooms are all fully and comfortably furnished. A long, covered terrace provides ample opportunity for al fresco meals and social gatherings, while three guest bedrooms open onto a covered first floor balcony, which allows for plenty of incredible sunset photo opportunities.Spacious open-plan room designs with polished wooden floors and a warm colour scheme lend a welcoming, homely atmosphere to the interiors. Outside in the beachside garden, the villa's 25-metre, black-tiled infinity swimming pool forms a dramatic centrepiece, complemented by a separate gym and spa pavilion for the ultimate private resort experience.

listing.listing_description: along the beach of Laem Noi on the northern-west coast of Koh Samui, Villa Soong is a stunning, beachfront residence that is perfectly designed for savoring the island's incomparable natural beauty. With extraordinary indoor/outdoor spaces and three bedrooms, all with king size beds, the villa is an ideal vacation rental for couples, destination wedding guests, and families who desire privacy and exquisite style in one of the most beautiful corners of Thailand.Nestled on a gated estate, the elegantly modernist Villa Soong features expansive areas for ocean-view relaxation and entertainment. By the infinite swimming pool, elegant lounge furniture invites you to relish long days in the sun, while the lovely lawn between the pool and beach includes paired sunbeds for a romantic afternoons of gazing at the Gulf of Thailand. From there, you'll step directly onto the white sands of your secluded beach, immersing yourself in the warm, azure waters.The open-plan, indoor/outdoor living area is ideal for spending evenings together in the ocean breeze. Enjoy cocktails and conversation in the comfortable lounge with flat screen TV, before gathering around the beautiful dining table for a delicious feast. The bright, alfresco kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a breakfast bar. The design and décor are exquisite throughout, with a large wall of exposed stone, lovely wood furnishings, and an overall aesthetic of modernist naturalism that create the perfect ambiance for serene escape into the present.The villa's three bedrooms, accommodating six, give each guest or couple a peaceful sanctuary for daytime privacy and restful nights. Each of the rooms has a king bed, ensuite bathroom, sumptuous bedding, and gorgeous décor. The master bedroom opens to the terrace and has a stand-alone shower and bath in its ensuite bathroom.At Villa Soong, you're wonderfully situated for enjoying the precious natural beauty of the island, as well as its myriad options for sport and leisure. Along with Laem Noi Beach outside your door, you're minutes away from the beaches of Bang Por, Nathon, Lipa Noi, and Mae Num. The Santiburi Beach Resort and Spa is also nearby, and features a golf course. The precious treasure of Ko Samui Rainforest can be reached within minutes as well.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Impeccable service, thoughtful amenities and creatively landscaped gardens take you a world away from the ordinary at Avasara Residence. What’s more, this luxury Koh Samui vacation rental is in a spectacular location on the grounds of the intimate Panacea Retreat Residence, overlooking tropical rainforests and the tranquil Gulf of Samui. Five suite-style bedrooms and spacious living areas let you bring friends and family together at this decadent private retreat.Your holiday at Avasara Residence begins with an airport transfer and continues with chef and butler service and daily breakfast. You’ll want to spend most of your stay on the terrace by the gleaming infinity pool, which is surrounded by a row of lounge chairs and sunbeds and even a whimsical sculpture. Flip on the outdoor sound system and serve drinks at the swim-up bar, or try out local specialties on the barbecue and sit down at the al-fresco dining area. If you want to learn more about the local cuisine, take a Thai cooking lesson; if you’d rather relax, enjoy a massage or yoga session instead.Glass-walled pavilions topped by peaked roofs make the most of the natural scenery and lush landscaping by renowned designer Bill Bensley. Along with the wood-paneled ceiling in the great room, fiber rugs and wicker sofas add natural texture, while poppy-red accent pillows and decorative sculptures fill the space with color and personality. The generous indoor dining area can seat up to ten guests, and the fully equipped, state-of-the-art kitchen also has a breakfast bar for more casual meals.Each of the five bedrooms at Avasara Residence has en-suite bathroom; two of the suites open to the balcony as well. As in the great room, creamy tile floors, natural-fiber rugs and woven chairs create a neutral backdrop, while brilliant red throws and accent pillows add happy pops of color.While it’s tempting to stay by the pool at Avasara Residence, it’s well worth making the 3 km drive to Bophut Beach, the 7 km drive to Chaweng or Maenam beaches, the 16 km drive to Lamai Beach or the 20 km drive to Nathon Beach, whether to wade in the shallows or relive your honeymoon with a romantic stroll. And from Fisherman’s Village, the Big Buddha Temple and the town of Chaweng to the Nathon and Koh Samui piers, the Koh Samui Rainforest, the Nathon Night Food Market and Namuang Safari Park, there’s plenty to see and do in the area. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 9 km trip from the villa to Samui Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Acacia offers an inspiring beachfront location on Koh Samui at Miskawaan Estate, an exclusive hamlet bordering Maenam and Bangrak beaches along the island's north shore. Designed in a vintage Thai style and endowed with high-end amenities for dining and entertainment, the four-bedroom home offers an exquisite setting for experiencing the unique beauty of this Southeast Asian gem. Special features include a poolside bar, alfresco dining sala, outdoor projector screen, sumptuous massage bed, and expansive views of the Gulf of Thailand. Your vacation rental includes an outstanding Villa Manager among other talented staff.Nestled amid vibrant gardens, the gem-toned swimming pool extends across the property, steps from the soft white sands and luminous waves. Lounge chairs are perched on the lush grass beneath swaying palms, perfect for gazing upon the sweeping ocean views and Koh Pha Ngan island in the distance. The superb sala shelters a massage bed and rustic table for meals in the sea-fresh breeze.The main living pavilion features high, vaulted ceilings over a spacious salon and lovely dining table. Amber-toned natural wood and a spectacular painting with luxuriant colors harmonize with the gardens and sea. Sliding doors allow the home to breathe the ocean air, while air conditioning keeps the ambiance cool when needed. The full bar on the veranda (complete with extensive wine fridge) forms the fulcrum of this seamless indoor/outdoor space.The elegant minimalism of the bedroom furnishings accentuates the fine artistry of the wooden walls, infusing your downtime hours with a timeless serenity. Each room features an ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet, ceiling fan, and air conditioning, and all open to the pool terrace or inner courtyard garden. The master bedroom opens directly to the pool and its own furnished veranda facing the sea.Miskawaan (meaning "Buddha's gardens") offers an excellent alternative to Koh Samui's popular resorts, well-suited to weddings, special occasions, or intimate getaways. Its prime location places you within easy reach of iconic destinations like Big Buddha and Fisherman's Village, the famed golf courses at Royal Samui and Santiburi, and several ancient temples. Myriad activities can be arranged nearby, from watersports to Muay Thai lessons, yoga to cooking classes, yachting to zip-lining over tropical waterfalls.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This magnificent waterfront home is located on the southeast coast of Koh Samui, just minutes from Chaweng Beach. Designed by renowned Thai architect Bodin Sritrakul, the villa was awarded the Thailand property award for "best architectural design" in 2013, and was named "best honeymoon hideaway" by the World Boutique Hotel Awards in London in 2015. The home's unique form features a cavernous main pavilion opening to a spacious sundeck with infinity pool, poised harmoniously on the lush hillside as though hovering above the turquoise sea. Breathtaking, panoramic views encompass the vast Gulf of Thailand and verdant coastline, including nearby Royal Samui Golf Club.The design blends exterior and interior living spaces into a gracefully unified whole. Dip into the luminous pool and sunbathe on lounge chairs in the dreamy breeze. Relax in the shade of the canopied sun bed, or retreat into the cool living room, sinking into comfortable sofas and admiring the vast horizon. A lovely staircase leads to the mezzanine level, where the fully equipped kitchen with chef-grade appliances serves a dining table for eight. Fresh white walls glow with the daylight and sunset tones, complementing the naturalistic lines and beautiful accents of wood and stone.The master suite features a sumptuous king bed and a spacious, furnished balcony with extraordinary ocean views. Its ensuite bathroom includes a deep soaking tub perched beside a glass wall opening to the balcony. There is one guest suite with queen bed and one suite with two twins (excellent for children); both enjoy private balconies and ensuite bathrooms. The forth room features a queen bed and shares a bathroom with the living room. All of the villa's bedrooms have air conditioning, safes, and TVs, forming comfortable havens for family members or destination wedding guests.The ideal location of Moon Shadow Villa balances serenity, privacy, and excellent proximity to the finest attractions on Koh Samui—including Chaweng Town, Fisherman's Village, and Wat Plai Laem. Several beaches are within easy driving distance, and you're less than nine kilometers from the island's main international airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Climbing the hillside, this multi-level oceanfront home captures panoramic sea views on the quiet side of Phuket. Designed by Gary Fell of GFab, this super-villa is one of Thailand’s most prestigious, and secluded. Throw a pool party on the terrace. Fire up the state of the art barbecue. And bask in the peaceful environment. When you’re ready for some action, drive 10-minutes to downtown Phuket.Open your eyes each morning to the sun rising above the Andaman Sea. Sip coffee on the terrace beneath the shade of a beach umbrella. If you’re not quite ready for group activity, have that coffee on the master’s private balcony. In the kitchen, you’ll find restaurant caliber appliances that are sure to inspire your inner chef. After breakfast, catch up on some reading by the pool or do a quick work out in the home gym. For dinner, Skyfall’s crisp white walls, mid-century modern furnishings, and spacious open-air interiors set a perfect tone for a party. On quieter nights, curl up with the family for a movie in the living room or a picnic dinner on the lawn.Hop on a ferry and head out to the neighboring islands to find secluded beaches, natural wonders, and watersport opportunities. Take a sea kayaking tour through the James Bond islands, Monkey Cave, and Karst. For even more excitement, Phuket’s 4-in-1 Tours will have you ziplining through the jungle, white water rafting, exploring ancient temples, and ATVing, all on the same day.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The lines between indoors and out dissolve to stunning effect at Villa Saan. Set dramatically on a rocky headland, the luxury Kamala vacation rental boasts breathtaking views of the Andaman Sea from a broad terrace and soaring open-sided, cathedral-like space. Beautifully appointed living areas and six suite-style bedrooms, all facing the water, give the feeling of a resort, yet in a serene and private setting.A chef, housekeeper, property manager and security service are waiting to make your stay at the villa a comfortable one. Relax on one of the lounge chairs on the sunny terrace while dipping your toes in the infinity pool, read or nap at the outdoor sitting area, have a soak in the hot tub and taste local seafood fresh from the barbecue. Challenge yourself in the fitness room or indulge in the massage room or at the bar. For younger guests, there’s a selection of toys and games as well as Apple TV.Though the interiors of Villa Saan feature luxe finishes and fine furnishings, they’re elegant and understated, letting the commanding views be the stars of each room. Nowhere is this more apparent than the central foyer, where the soaring ceilings and open walls are accented by a simple pair of white sofas. The living and dining rooms are equally refined, with a generous white sectional and coffee table in one and clean-lined crimson chairs in the other, and playful wire-edged chandeliers in both. Though your stay includes chef service, there is a fully equipped kitchen.Six bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and ocean views can easily accommodate the whole family. There are three suites with king beds, one with a queen bed and two with two twin beds each. Set on the upper floor and opening to its own hot tub and furnished terrace, the master bedroom could be a honeymoon suite or romantic retreat for a couple. Glass-fronted balconies, nearly wall-to-wall windows and fresh white walls and bedding ensure that the other bedrooms are bright and airy.With Kamala Beach, Patong Beach and Surin Beach all within a 6-mile drive, it’s easy to experience some of Thailand’s best stretches of sand. If you’d like to explore further, ask the villa manager to arrange a tee time at nearby Red Mountain Golf Course or Laguna Golf Course, charter a boat to go island hopping or recommend a restaurant in Old Town Phuket. Those not worn out by the sun and surf can venture out to the famous bars on Bangla Road for an evening on the town. At the end of your holiday, plan on a 32 km drive to Phuket International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Five separate levels of oceanfront views, joined by a series of marble staircases and elevators, complete this villa along Phuket’s exclusive and famous, “Millionaire’s Mile.” Carved into the rocks on the Kamala headland, the secluded spot, designed by Paris-based architect Arte Charpentier, inspires a tranquil escape. Red Mountain Golf Club, Surin Beach, and nightlife at Bangla Road are nearby.Towering windows look out from every room onto the dense wilderness and dramatic seascape. A winding wooden staircase leads down the cliff past sculpted gardens to the rocks and coves below. Transparent balconies from all 6 bedrooms look out onto the Andaman Sea. Frolic in the ocean or swim a few laps in the refreshing, ice blue infinity pool that looks directly out onto the glimmering horizon. Sunbeds and loungers offer the perfect spot to dry off in the sun. Treat yourself to an in-house Thai massage located in the peaceful seaview sala.Villa Minh is ideal for extended family vacations, weddings, events or just a fun trip away with your closest friends. The in-house chef will masterfully prepare all meals, either on the poolside barbecue or in the sleek steel kitchen. In the home cinema, lined with plush crimson walls, curl up on the oversized sectional couch and get lost in a favourite flick. A pool table with bar area makes the perfect recipe for some competitive fun. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist. Fill your camera roll with stunning sea and sunset views at Villa Amanzi Kamala. This thoughtfully designed, carefully built vacation rental spills over the hillside toward the emerald waters of the Andaman Sea in a show of architectural mastery. Though it’s tucked away on the exclusive Cape Amarin estate on Phuket’s west coast, it’s close to Kamala Beach, golf courses, restaurants, entertainment and more.A nearly 50-foot infinity pool sets a tone of resort-worthy luxury for the villa’s living spaces. Entertain friends and family or simply relax on the loungers alongside the pool or in the outdoor sitting area. Sit down to a meal fresh from the barbecue as you watch the sunset from the al-fresco dining area. After sunset, gather in the media room or share photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi.Inspired by traditional Thai stilt houses, the villa’s award-winning architecture follows the slope of the hillside, with the bedrooms forming a bridge and the main living areas below. The breathtaking great room can be opened on two sides via slide-away glass walls; the other two walls are formed from the landscape’s rock face. Open-concept living and dining areas are minimalist yet inviting, and the fully equipped kitchen will have you eager to try out local ingredients.Each of the six bedrooms at Villa Amanzi Kamala is a private haven with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and ocean view or terrace access. Floor-to-ceiling glass perfectly frames the sea and sky, while wood floors lend traditional warmth to the bedroom suites.The villa’s Cape Amarin location puts guests close to the resort-lined stretch of Kamala Beach and the lively nightlife of Patong Beach. Book a tee time at one of two nearby golf courses, bring the family to a unique dinner show at FantaSea or find a tucked-away spot for a honeymoon-worthy dinner amid the heritage buildings in Phuket Old Town.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This stunning luxury villa is part of the exclusive Malaiwana estate in Thalaga, along a secluded and pristine shoreline in northwest Phuket Island. Perched above Nai Thon Beach, Villa Haleana features breathtaking ocean views, superb outdoor and indoor living areas, five deluxe king bedrooms, and outstanding contemporary amenities. For large families, friends, and destination wedding guests seeking exquisite privacy and style in one of the most beautiful regions of Thailand, Villa Haleana is an unparalleled choice.Situated amid lush tropical gardens, the villa enjoys panoramic views of the Andaman Sea from its terrace and capacious interior. Savor a soak in the eighteen-meter infinite swimming pool, and sip cool drinks on elegant sun loungers. Fire up the grill for a Thai seafood barbeque, and relish it at the lovely, ocean-view table.Expansive glass walls open to the superb Great Room, creating a seamless space for relaxation, dining, and entertainment. Under high, peaked ceilings, relax together on the sumptuous sectional sofa, enjoying cocktails and beholding the dreamy horizon. Prepare delicious meals in the fully equipped kitchen, gather around the gorgeous dining table for festive feasts, and withdraw into the cozy media lounge. In the morning, refresh your mind and body in the fitness room and spa. Air conditioning, round-the-clock security, and an elevator ensure total convenience and comfort. Spa, and other services are available at extra cost.All five bedrooms have lush king beds and one with twin beds that is convertible to a double, direct access to exterior living areas, and ocean views. The master suite features a lounge, walk-in closet and dressing area, desk, private balcony, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and tub. The primary guest room also has a walk-in closet and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The other guest rooms have ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers. In bedrooms three and four, the king beds can be replaced paired twin beds.Along with exquisite seclusion, Villa Haleana enjoys an excellent location for exploring the island of Phuket. Nai Thon Beach is just steps away, while Layan Beach is ten minutes away on foot. You're also a short drive from Dream Beach Club, Banyan Tree Spa and The Laguna Phuket Golf Club. Phuket International Airport is about eight miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take a break from the ordinary—and from the ordinary resort—at Purana Residence. This four-bedroom, fully staffed luxury Koh Samui vacation rental gives you the personal service and amenities of a resort in a beautifully appointed private villa. Though it’s in a spectacular setting overlooking rolling hills of tropical rainforest and the Gulf of Samui, it’s also close to some of Thailand’s best beaches and intriguing local sights, making it ideal for celebrating a special family occasion or taking a memorable getaway with friends.During your stay, a dedicated housekeeper, butler and villa manager are on hand, and a chef can prepare both Thai specialties and Western favorites. Don’t forget to take advantage of the Thai cooking lesson and massage or yoga session. When you’re not partaking of the daily fresh-baked cookies and fresh-blended smoothies, grab a spot in the sun on a lounger or daybed on the terrace next to the infinity pool and let yourself relax. Flip on the outdoor sound system to set the mood as you serve drinks at the swim-up bar or heat up the barbecue in the outdoor kitchen. End the day with a delicious meal at the al-fresco dining area.From the beautiful landscaping by renowned designer Bill Bensley outside to the specially commissioned pieces inside, every detail at Purana Residence has been considered. Not only does the spacious great room feature an airy shell of glass walls and a high peaked ceiling, it’s filled with hand-woven fabrics and traditional carved furniture for an atmosphere that’s bright and sunny yet refined. A sitting area at one end has plenty of sofas, chairs and benches to seat everyone, the formal dining area can comfortably accommodate up to eight guests, and the fully equipped kitchen at the other end of the great room has a breakfast bar.The villa’s four bedrooms show the same thought and care; a king bed, en-suite bathroom with rain shower and a door to the balcony or terrace makes each one feel like a lavish honeymoon suite. Linger in the lounge chairs in the bedrooms or in the glassed-in, spa-worthy showers in the bathrooms—you’re on holiday after all.If you can tear yourself away from the pool terrace at Purana Residence, there’s plenty to see and do in the area, from Fisherman’s Village, Big Buddha Temple and the piers at Nathon and Koh Samui to the Koh Samui Rainforest, the Nathon Night Food Market and Namuang Safari Park. Don’t miss the nearby beaches, from Bophut, 3 km away, and Chaweng and Maenam, about 8 km away, to Lamai, 17 km away, and Nathon, 20 km away. When it’s time to return home, plan on a 9 km drive from the villa to Samui Airport to make your connection.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Samujana One, part of the exclusive community of Samujana luxury properties, is a five-bedroom contemporary villa on the island of Koh Sumai in Thailand. With stunning views of the Gulf of Thailand and the dreamy surrounding islands, and ample spaces for indoor/outdoor relaxation and entertainment, it's the ideal vacation rental for relishing exquisite privacy among family and friends in one of most beautiful locations in Southeast Asia.The villa features serene, expansive views of the Gulf of Thailand from its large pool terrace, alfresco living area, and bedroom balconies. You'll enjoy long, tropical afternoons floating in the salt-water infinite swimming pool, sunbathing on poolside loungers, and relaxing in the charming sala pavilion. In the evening, withdraw into the villa's lovely indoor/outdoor open-plan living area, where you'll sip cocktails in the sumptuous lounge on the crescent-shaped sofa, and dine at the elegant table for ten. The fully equipped kitchen features a breakfast bar and ocean views—ideal for preparing delicious Thai meals and serving up cocktails to family and friends. With plentiful outdoor lighting, you can relish the ocean breeze deep into the night.The villa's cool interior includes wonderful amenities for relaxation, entertainment, and fitness. The movie room with projector features deluxe, cascading couches, ideal for watching movies together in utter comfort. There's also a large indoor lounge with flat screen TV and curtained glass doors opening to the pool terrace. A surround-sound system and ping-pong table will keep you entertained, while air conditioning and fans will keep you cool. To refresh your body after a long night, the well-appointed fitness room will inspire you with ocean-view doors opening to the fresh morning air.The villa's five bedrooms all feature ocean views, private terrace access, sumptuous king size beds, and ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers and large bathtubs. Each room is wonderfully luminous and full of ocean light, making them perfect for private downtime and sweet, slumberous nights.Samujana One is perfectly situated for enjoying the paradisal beauty of Koh Samui. You're just minutes from both Choeng Mon Beach and Chaweng Beach, and a ten-mile drive to Koh Samui Rainforest. For golf, Bohput Hills Golfclub and Santiburi Samui Country Club are just a short drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
